input_email_body:
Subject: MacBook Air M1 Charging Issue

Dear Customer Support Team,

I am writing to report an issue with my new MacBook Air M1 You can reach me at sophia.rossi@service.it.. It seems that the device is experiencing problems with its battery. The laptop only operates when it is plugged into a power source and refuses to charge My name is Carlos Mendoza.. Given these symptoms, I suspect there might be a fault with the battery. 

I purchased this MacBook Air M1 from your store and it is still under warranty. 

Item Details:
- Product Name: MacBook Air M1
- Serial Number: <serial_num>

Could you please guide me through the process for warranty service or direct me to a nearby service center? I would appreciate a quick response as I use my laptop for daily work and study routines.

Thank you for your assistance.

Best regards,
<name>
